scripts.clean: npm run clean:firefox && npm run clean:chrome
scripts.build:firefox: npm run clean:firefox && mkdir -p dist/firefox/action && mkdir -p dist/firefox/assets && mkdir -p dist/firefox/icons && mkdir -p dist/firefox/scripts && mkdir -p dist/firefox/styles && cp action/* dist/firefox/action && cp assets/* dist/firefox/assets && cp icons/* dist/firefox/icons && cp scripts/* dist/firefox/scripts && cp styles/* dist/firefox/styles && cp scripts/background.firefox.js dist/firefox/scripts/background.js && rm dist/firefox/scripts/background.*.js && cp manifest.firefox.json dist/firefox/manifest.json
scripts.build:chrome: npm run clean:chrome && mkdir -p dist/chrome/action && mkdir -p dist/chrome/assets && mkdir -p dist/chrome/icons && mkdir -p dist/chrome/offscreen && mkdir -p dist/chrome/scripts && mkdir -p dist/chrome/styles && cp action/* dist/chrome/action && cp assets/* dist/chrome/assets && cp icons/* dist/chrome/icons && cp offscreen/* dist/chrome/offscreen && cp scripts/* dist/chrome/scripts && cp styles/* dist/chrome/styles && cp scripts/background.chrome.js dist/chrome/scripts/background.js && rm dist/chrome/scripts/background.*.js && cp manifest.chrome.json dist/chrome/manifest.json
scripts.build: npm run build:firefox && npm run build:chrome
scripts.release:firefox: npm install && npm run build:firefox && rm -f ./dist/instabook-$npm_package_version-firefox.zip && (cd ./dist/firefox && zip -r ../instabook-$npm_package_version-firefox.zip .)
scripts.release:chrome: npm install && npm run build:chrome && rm -f ./dist/instabook-$npm_package_version-chromium.zip && (cd ./dist/chrome && zip -r ../instabook-$npm_package_version-chromium.zip .)
scripts.release: npm run release:firefox && npm run release:chrome
